problem_names:
lemma dg_GRPH_components:
  shows "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<CC>. digraph \<alpha> \<CC>}"
    and "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_dghms \<alpha>"
    and "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)"
    and "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)"
translations:
lemma dg_GRPH_components:
  shows "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<CC>. digraph \<alpha> \<CC>}"
    and "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_dghms \<alpha>"
    and "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)"
    and "dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. digraph \<alpha> \<CC>} &&&
     dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_dghms \<alpha>) &&&
    dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>) &&&
    dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ([ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (digraph \<alpha>)), all_dghms \<alpha>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. digraph \<alpha> \<CC>} &&&
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (digraph \<alpha>)), all_dghms \<alpha>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
     all_dghms \<alpha>) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (digraph \<alpha>)), all_dghms \<alpha>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>2\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (digraph \<alpha>)), all_dghms \<alpha>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>3\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)

goal (11 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<beta>

 4. vsv (dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)

    dg_GRPH \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>

subsection\<open>Arrow with a domain and a codomain\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<FF> :
  \<AA> \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> \<BB>

using this:
  \<FF> :
  \<AA> \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> \<BB>
  \<FF> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> all_dghms \<alpha>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> =
    \<AA> &&&
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_dghms \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> =
    \<BB>
